embossed seals of the notary public

ichor.text: dead tomato squashed with moldy purple spots
lutefisk and anti-lutefisk (which self-annhilate on contact)
potent magical artifacts (no, wait, you ruined those)
snips and snails and puppy-dog tails
sugar and spice and everything nice

insult.text: ah, that delivery i expected must be here... where do i sign?
all monsters report to battle stations
all of this has happened before
all work and no play makes Jack a dull diggle
alms for the poor
are you a god?
are you makin' eyes at me???
are you ready to RUMBLE!?
before i kill you, eyebrowed one...
by will alone i set my mind in motion
can I have your autograph?
can we get this over quickly? I have to get up at 5 am
can you spare any change?
cease yer chattering
congratulations, you're about to die
devil take your eyebrows
dibs! this clone is mine
didn't your mom teach you not to stare?
diggle me this, browman
do you have a sister?
do you read Sutter Caine?
don't fear the reaper
don't fire till you see the whites under their eyebrows
don't you dare take my crafting ingredients
don't tell me what i cant do
Dredmor, Dredmor, he's our man, if he can't kill you, no one can!
Dredmor is dead! Long live Lord Dredmor!
Dredmor School of Anything Goes Martial Arts - final attack!
dying is fun
eat that what falls from my tail
enraged diggle, sweet diggle, creole diggle, diggle kebab, diggle royale with cheese
even food can't save you now!
excuse me, i think you dropped this zorkmid
every rejection, every disappointment, has led you here to this moment
eyebrowachu, I choose you!
fear my polish-hammer-attack
fear is the mind-killer
fear is the little death which brings total obliteration
finish him!
fresh meat
Girls! Pentagram of Death!
gooooooooo Team Dredmor!
grab the handle, push the button
have you accepted Lord Dredmor as your personal savior?
head towards the light
hello, 911? I'd like to report a home invasion
henchman 4 life
herding nerfs is a lot harder than it sounds
here comes fine stuff for the gallows
hi ho hi ho it's off to work i go
how now eye brow?
human for dinner again?!?
i am the key master, are you the gate keeper?
i am jack's experience bar
i am your father
i die the final death, and so I know thee, Opener
i guess i shouldn't have cut class today
i have a restraining order that says you can't come within 500 feet
i haven't eaten since later this afternoon
i just applied to the Evil League of Evil
i just applied to the Guild of Calamitous Intent
i know kung fu
i never could get the hang of thursdays
i see nothing! nothing!
i seem to be having this tremendous difficulty with my lifestyle
i swear this is just a cry for attention
i thought they smelled bad on the outside
i thought you always played on Elvish Easy
i want my mummy
i was just having some wine and cheese, would you care to join me?
i wasn't droppin' no eaves
i will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger
ia! ia! cthulhu fhtagn!
i'll cut yer heart out and eat it before yee
i'll pipeclay you with a wannion
i'll use my magic sword, it's +1 vs eyebrows
i'll grind yer bones to make me bread
i'm casting a curse on your next Evil Chest!
i'm gonna hit you so hard, your next three player characters will feel it
i'm gonna cut you up and turn the bits into lutefisk
i'm might wander off just to make you waste bolts or mana
i'm not throwing away my shot
i'm slicing up eyebrows, i want you to know
i'm so excited, I just peed myself
i'm so short, i can't see the dungeon for the trees
i'm terrified beyond the capacity for rational thought
i'm a named miniboss, but i have amnesia
i'm your huckleberry
IGNORE ME!!!
in Dredmor we trust
insert witticism here
is it secret? is it safe?
is that a chevre log in your belt, or are you just happy to see me?
is that lutefisk in your pants, or are you just gross and slimy?
is this gonna be a stand-up fight, or another bug hunt?
is this thing on?
its not easy being *insert pallette tint value*
it'll be permadeath for you
just when you think life canâ€™t possibly get any worse it suddenly does
krong told me he hates you
lemme at im
let the genocide begin
life is like a cube of lutefisk... you never want what you're gonna get
like tears in the rain...
lock and load
lock s-foils in attack position
look alive
look, behind you!
make it so
may your eyebrows chip and shatter
meat is back on the menu!
Mecha-Shiva! Mecha-Shiva!
must die, must die, this eyebrow must die
my parents were killed by someone who looked just like you
my precious!
nastybad eyebrowthing
no sir, but I do bite my thumb
no time to grind, eh?
no time to die
none shall pass
oh, a wise guy, huh?
oh great, another wandering eyebrow salesman
oh no, not again
oh, you sweet summer child
on permadeath, the survival rate for everyone drops to zero
oota goota, solo?
outta my way
oye beltalowda!
pardon me, but would you happen to have any Grey Poupon?
please cast 'Animal Friend' on me
puff up, puff up! they hate that
praise be to Dredmor
prepare to be boarded
protect the children and eggs!
queen to bishop six, check
rally round the Dredmor statue
red alert
red rum
rut row raggy
say 'what' again
save yourselves! it's the Eyebrowed Horror!
say, do you have a twin?
sod off, blighter
stay frosty
stop poking me
strike your colors
swing batter batter swing
take me with you! I can't LIVE down here!
tear down the wall
tell me of your homeworld Usul
that RNG is brutal, huh?
the death you face will make men's blood run cold for a hundred years
the hammer is my diggle
...that's what 'True Blue' is about, no argument there...
there can be only one
there's nought like liquor fer putting the devil into a man
these are not the diggles you're looking for
these PK readings are off the scale
this is your life and it's ending one minute at a time
those shoes and that hat do NOT go together
thou art a beslubbering ill-composed clack-dish
thy churlish fool-born nut-hook hath a swag-bellied maggot-pie
today is a good day to die
too bad she wont live... then again, who does?
toys for tots, donate here
trick or treat!
two men enter, one man leaves!
vengeance is mine
viva la Dredmor
wake up! time to die!
we are an army bred for a single purpose: to destroy the world of men
we come in peace (shoot to kill)
we control the vertical
we don't serve your kind here
we got the guillotine, you better run
we'll hang ye by the gibbet, ye parrot-loving sea-dog
we'll meet again in Valhalla
what's with the forehead merkins?
what's worse, thinking you're being paranoid, or knowing you should be?
when i grow up, i wanna be a _wandering_ monster
where is the horse and rider? where is the horn that was blowing?
where there's a whip, there's a way
where's the commode in this dungeon?
who you gonna call?
whoa, dude, i'm going to kill Count Dracula
would you like to buy some candy bars, to support Monster Scout Troop 108?
yellow was never a pirate's color
yo momma
you are not a beautiful or unique snowflake
you better save your game before I get to you
you can't join project mayhem, your eyebrows are too big
you can't win, i rigged the RNG!
you demented meat-puppet
you have all the tenderness of a sea-sick crocodile
you're locked in here with me!
you must be here to see the plans for the hyperspace bypass
you shall not pass
you smell like feet wrapped in leathery, burnt bacon
you sure do dress funny
you walk like a robot chicken
you will know what it means to be roasted in the depths of a Slor
you'll die like a diggle
you'll go nicely with a little grated cheese
you'll need food to regain health
you're a crooked jerky jockey
you're a complete knee-biter
you're about to see your name on the scoreboard
you're interrupting diggle glee club
you're just more meat for the grinder
you're tracking mud all over my floor
your wardrobe is laughable
your skin will make a nice rug to cover over the patch of dirt in the corner
2 more XP and i'll level up

random.text: 5 by 5. We're in the pipe.
A random Uber-Chest has been sealed closed forever. That's one less lever to pull.
Attention B-Mart shoppers. There is a blue light special in Brax shop number 3.
Boy does this thing take forever to update.
Checking for wandering monsters...
Colder. Much colder.
Commence ignition.
Danger! Danger Eyebrow Robinson!
Elvis has left the dungeon.
Eelvis has left the dungeon.
Everytime you ring a bell, a new miniboss earns its name
Ground Control to Major Tom...
I wonder wonder wonder who oh who wrote the Book of the Dead
Lord Dredmor has leveled up. Please delay further.
Red wizard needs food badly.
The Death Star has cleared the planet.
The pungent scent of Lutefisk wafts down the hall.
The following takes place between noon and 1 pm on the day of the California Presidential Primary...
There was a ghastly silence. There was a ghastly noise. There was a ghastly silence.
There's a Diggle Commando creeping up behind you!
This is a subliminal message. Play more Dredmor.
This is the water, and this is the well. Drink full, and descend.
This dungeon will self-destruct in 5... 4...
Wandering Monster spawned at coordinates x173 y28.
Wow! Did you see that?
You could probably use a shower, buddy.
You hear a distant blaring wail to the east.
You are entering a dimension not only of sight and sound, but of diggles.

title.text: King of the Andals and the

wizardtitle.text: , He Who Hath No Time To Grind
. No, the other one. No relation

wizardspiel.text: Architect of the Community Sauna on Level 4.
Available by weekend furlough program only.
Grill and mini-fridge installation our specialty.
If found, please return to locker 209.
If you've got the crime, I've got the time.
I'm a wanted man in 7 Kingdoms.
Inventor of the spell that doubles your XP total.
Inventor of ice-cream-flavored pants, and pants-flavored ice cream.
Light as a feather. Stiff as a board.
Mystery Knight from the tourney where the Mystery Knight won. Honest.
Platonic ideal of a wizard, but not of a friend.
Plate-spinning is more than just my hobby.
Prog-rock flautist-alchemist, currently on sabbatical to compose his magnum opus.
Promethean one-hit wonder. I had my fifteen minutes of flame.
Purveyors of freshly-ground ingots, and ingot-grinders of exotic origin.
Slightly less evil than my competitors.
Specializing in the house-breaking of diggles.
Try to understand, he's a magic man.

wizardtag.text: Curb-side delivery available.
Don't believe what they say about me.
Don't blame me. I voted for the other guy.
Don't just Dred tommorrow, Dred today.
Don't tell me what I can't do.
Half the price for half the dungeon.
If you find my pants, please call.
I'll see you in court.
I've seen things you diggles wouldn't believe.
I wasted time. Now time wastes me.
I won't waste your time explaining what any of this means.
My necromancy brings all the zombies to the yard.
My pocket-dimension is twice the size of this dungeon floor. Don't quote me on that.
Released on his own recognizance, pending the appeal.
Spoons bent while you wait.
The owls are not what they seem.
These keys will self destruct in 5... 4...
This video contains a paid promotional advertisement.
We can slaughter it for you wholesale.
We'll spend the rest of the season pretending that I'm not secretly Sauron.
Will work for ... whatever you find on the dungeon floor.
You don't need a legal team, you need the evil team.
You won't find a smaller dungeon anywhere - or your money back!
You wouldn't understand.
